software.name: 1995: All the News and Views
software.Description: 1995: All the News and Views is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Lost Boys and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: 3rd Degree
software.Description: 3rd Degree is a Miscellaneous game, developed by PF.Magic and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1993.

software.name: 7th Guest, The
software.Description: A stunning interactive drama of mystery and intrigue... You don't know why you're in the mansion of the long-gone master toy maker, but you do know that you're not alone...

software.name: ABC Sports Presents: Power Hitter
software.Description: ABC Sports Presents: Power Hitter is a Sports game, developed by Fathom Pictures and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1992.

software.name: ABC Sports Presents: The Palm Spring Open
software.Description: ABC Sports Presents: The Palm Spring Open is a Sports game, developed by Fathom Pictures and published by Philips, which was released in 1991.

Release.name: ABC Sports Presents: The Palm Spring Open
ABC Sports Presents: The Palm Spring Open

ReleaseImages.Image: ABC Sports Presents The Palm Spring Open (EU)-82247_front.jpg

software.name: Accelerator
software.Description: Accelerator is a Racing game, developed by The Vision Factory and published by SPC Vision, which was released in Europe in 1997.

software.name: Alfapet
software.Description: Alfapet is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by ADATEK, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Alice in Wonderland
software.Description:
Now you are Alice and Wonderland awaits you.
Mad Hatter, the Cheshire Cat, the Queen of Spades, and all the Wonderland characters are there.
This Interactive fast-paced adventure game of the classic Alice in Wonderland excites the player with 250 amazing scenarios and 40 eccentric and rich characters.
There are mushrooms, cakes and potions, all ready to eat. One will make you as small as a mouse; another as big as a giant!
Characters appear to help (or hinder) you as you gather the clues and acquire the powers needed to escape from Wonderland and return home.
Rich digital color and sound add to one of the most inventive, fun CD-I programs yet.

software.name: Alien Gate
software.Description: Alien Gate is an Action game, developed by Vision Games and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1993.

software.name: Apprentice, The
software.Description: Poor Marvin needs your help! As apprentice to the great wizard Gandorf S. Wandburner III, Marvin must perform treacherous tasks throughout the castle towers. Take control of the apprentice and guide him through six heart-stopping levels in the arcade-style platform game that delivers fast, furious play with thousands of frames of animation. You'll be running, jumping, flying, even swimming your way around the towers, working against the clock and all the beastly enemies who are eager to prove that a wizard's work is never done!

software.name: Arcade Classics
software.Description: Remember the good old days spending hours behind the arcade machine? These days are back. "Arcade Classics" has 3 all time classic games from the time that "Game play" was #1: Ms. Pac-Man, Galaxian and Galaga!

software.name: Asterix: Caesar's Challenge
software.Description: Asterix: Caesar's Challenge is an Adventure game, developed by Infogrames and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Atlantis: The Last Resort
software.Description: The parole officer has just made you an offer you cannot refuse... "Shut down the reactor at the heart of the Atlantis resort and you can have your freedom." Your reply... "Where's my rocket launcher?" 20 levels of mindless blasting!!

software.name: Axis and Allies
software.Description: Axis and Allies is a Miscellaneous game, developed by CapDisc and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1994.

software.name: Backgammon
software.Description: Backgammon is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Capitol Disc Interactive and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Battleship
software.Description: Battleship is a Miscellaneous game, developed by CapDisc and published by American Softworks, which was released in 1991.

software.name: Beauty & The Beast
software.Description: Beauty & The Beast is an Action game, developed by Lightyear Entertainment and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1992.

software.name: Berenstain Bears: On Their Own, The
software.Description: The Berenstain Bears: On Their Own is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1993.

Release.name: The Berenstain Bears: On Their Own

ReleaseImages.Image: The Berenstain Bears On Their Own (US)-83216_front.jpg

software.name: Big Bang Show
software.Description: Big Bang Show is a Puzzle game, developed by Infogrames and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Brain Dead 13
software.Description: As Lance, the world's hippest computer repair guru, you're called to the mysterious castle of the disembodied brain, Dr. Nero Neurosis. You learn of the Doctor's master plan... There's no turning back now! Race through the evil playground of the demented Doctor's twisted castle and battle the ultimate mishaps of science: Moose, Vivi, and Fritz, the half-human half-pet of Dr. Neurosis.

software.name: Brer Rabbit and the Wonderful Tar Baby
software.Description: Brer Rabbit and the Wonderful Tar Baby is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Philips, which was released in 1991.

Release.name: Brer Rabbit and the Wonderful Tar Baby

ReleaseImages.Image: Brer Rabbit and the Wonderful Tar Baby (US)-82931_front.jpg

software.name: Burn:Cycle
software.Description: Sol Cutter's plan was to slip into Softech, do some quick electronic thievery and make a pile of cash. What could go wrong? Plenty. The job sours when a freak power surge leaves Cutter with the mother of all headaches. But that's not all. Somehow, a computer virus has installed itself in his head. In exactly two hours, the Burn:Cycle virus will turn Sol Cutter's brain into jelly - unless you can find a way to deactivate it. Think fast. Shoot faster.

software.name: Caesar's World of Boxing
software.Description: Caesar's World of Boxing is a Sports game, developed by CD-I Systems and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1993.
software.Genre: Sports > Individual > Combat > Boxing / Martial Arts

software.name: CD-i Hardware
software.Description: CD-I is a Hardware game, developed and published by Philips, which was released in 1991.

software.name: Chaos Control
software.Description: You have been chosen to repel the attacks of the Kesh-Rhan extra-terrestrials who are threatening Earth. In command of a spacefighter, you will travel through universes in full-screen synthesized images, going from the island of Manhattan to the heart of a virtual reality computer, reaching ultimately the pitfallls of outer space. Quick, take the controls, there is not a minute to be wasted!

software.name: Child Is Born, A
software.Description: A Child Is Born is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Electronic Sound and Pictures Limited and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Children's Musical Theatre
software.Description: Children's Musical Theatre is a Simulation game, developed by Sonic Images Productions, Inc. and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1992.

software.name: Christmas Country
software.Description: Finally, a platform game for CD-i with lots of enemies. Play and explore the exciting, long lasting, fun filled, 16 levels of Christmas Country.

software.name: Christmas Crisis
software.Description: Christmas Crisis is an Action game, developed by DIMA and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Classical Jukebox
software.Description: Classical Jukebox is a Miscellaneous game, published by Philips, which was released in 1991.

software.name: Clue
software.Description: Clue is a Miscellaneous game, developed by 3T Productions Ltd. and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1994.

software.name: Cluedo
software.Description: Clue is a Miscellaneous game, developed by 3T Productions Ltd. and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1994.

software.name: Compton's Interactive Encyclopedia
software.Description: Compton's Interactive Encyclopedia is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Philips and published by Compton's NewMedia, which was released in 1992.

software.name: Connect Four
software.Description: Connect Four is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Capitol Disc Interactive and published by Philips, which was released in 1991.

software.name: Crayon Factory, The
software.Description: The Crayon Factory is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Creature Shock
software.Description: We have no idea what's out there but whatever it is, it isn't friendly. Take no chances: shoot anything that moves. It took Argonaut 3 years to cram this Double CD full of stunningly rendered 3D environments. Play this eerie, creepy game at night with the lights out and your headphones on, if you dare!!!

software.name: Crime Patrol
software.Description: Be the ultimate crime fighter in this multi-level live action thriller! Face streetfight gangs and armed robbers as a rookie. Undercover, you'll hit mobsters and drug dealers. Join SWAT to take down bank robbers and bikers. Make it to the top in Delta Force and take on international terrorists!

software.name: Dame Was Loaded, The
software.Description: The Dame Was Loaded is an Adventure game, developed and published by Philips Media, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Dark Castle
software.Description: Dark Castle is an Adventure game, developed by Silicon Beach Software, Inc. and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1992.

software.name: Dark Fables of Aesop, The
software.Description: The Dark Fables of Aesop is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1992.

software.name: Defender of the Crown
software.Description: Strategy is vital in this chivalrous charade, and smarts will protect your hide better than armor as you command the role of a brave Saxon knight destined to avenge King Richard's murder. To reclaim the crown and conquer the heart of a beautiful maiden, you must outwit and outmaneuver hordes of medieval marauders. Read maps, plan raids, even team with Robin Hood, then plunder enemy strongholds, dueling for gold needed to build an army of mercenary vassals. You'll also need to stash cash for catapults that launch boulders, fire and disease into formidable fortresses. So wise up and rise up to this unique challenge where leadership is as important as swordmanship. For when you've survived this strategic adventure, complete with daring jousts and courageous castle sieges, you won't be sorry - you'll be king!

software.name: Destination Great Britain: Central & Northern England
software.Description: Destination Great Britain: Central & Northern England is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by World of Wonders, which was released in 1994.

Release.name: Destination Great Britain: Central & Northern England

software.Description: Dimo's Quest is a Puzzle game, published by Philips Media, which was released in 1994.

software.name: Domino
software.Description: Domino is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Wigant Interactive Media and published by Haarlems Uitgeef Bedrijf, which was released in Europe in 1997.

software.name: Downhome Blues, The
software.Description: The Downhome Blues is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Lunaria and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1994.

software.name: Dragon's Lair
software.Description: You are Dirk the Daring, trying to rescue the lovely Princess Daphne from the evil Wizard Mordroc's spooky castle. Mordroc has more than a few twisted tricks up his sleeve, like tilting tiles, gobbling goblins, and a surplus of slime. His line-up of heinous henchmen include the Acid Creature and the Robot Knight - two nasty characters - and a fire-breathing dragon named Singe, whose welcome may be a bit too warm! The heat is on! Enter the lair - if you dare!

software.name: Dragon's Lair II: Time Warp
software.Description:
Princess Daphne has been spirited away to a wrinkle in time by the Evil Wizard Mordroc who plans to force her into marriage. Only you, Dirk the Daring, can save her.
Transported by a bumbling old time machine, you begin the rescue mission. But you must hurry, for once the Casket of Doom has opened, Mordroc will place the Death Ring upon Daphne's finger in marriage and she will be lost forever in the Time Warp!

software.name: Drug Wars
software.Description: Drug Wars is an Action game, developed by CapDisc and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1996.

software.name: Earth Command
software.Description: Earth Command is a Strategy game, developed by Visionary Media and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Effacer
software.Description: Effacer is a Puzzle game, developed by CapDisc and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Effacer: Hangman from the 25th Century
software.Description: Effacer is a Puzzle game, developed by CapDisc and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Emperor's New Clothes, The
software.Description: The Emperor's New Clothes is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1992.

software.name: Escape from Cyber City
software.Description: The Earth is under attack. The evil Guardian's forces are in control. Only a few continue to resist and only you can help. Your mission is to survive the dangers of CyberCity, fight your way to the train and destroy the Guardian's planet. Beware: things are not what they seem! Escape From CyberCity is the first CD-Interactive action adventure to utilize full cel-animation, giving the player the feel of starring in a fast action motion picture. This beautifully animated production features a dynamic, high impact soundtrack and complete interactive play.

software.name: Family Games
software.Description: Here's a game collection for the whole family. It'll keep EVERYONE glued to the screen for hours! Take your pick - action and adventure, brain teasers or straightforward entertainment. There are ten great games - Full Attack, Jokisen, Where's That Sound, Skid Kart, Captain Alphabet, Draw Stamp Color, SuperSlide, Morphon Invasion, Wizard and Hot Rocks.

software.name: Family Games II: Junk Food Jive
software.Description: If you like to flit around like a fly along dirty food residue, have to fight over the bill with your partner, if you want to invent your own clever pizza topping, have had greater ambitions than smaller people or have painted (yes) your masterpieces on thick place mats, then you will feel quite at home here!

Release.name: Family Games II: Junk Food Jive

ReleaseImages.Image: Family Games II Junk Food Jive (EU)-82525_front.jpg
Family Games II Junk Food Jive (EU)-82525_back.jpg

software.name: Flashback
software.Description: You're Conrad B. Hart, Galaxis Bureau of Investigation Agent and right now you're stranded on a far-away planet after discovering an alien plot to overtake Earth. You must travel and find your way through four planets back to Earth and foil the aliens' sinister and deadly plans. This is truly the most explosive and intriguing Flashback experience. And it's gonna rip you right out of your comfortable little century and hurl you smack into a time and place that'll have you begging for a nap!

software.name: Flashback: The Quest for Identity
software.Description: You're Conrad B. Hart, Galaxis Bureau of Investigation Agent and right now you're stranded on a far-away planet after discovering an alien plot to overtake Earth. You must travel and find your way through four planets back to Earth and foil the aliens' sinister and deadly plans. This is truly the most explosive and intriguing Flashback experience. And it's gonna rip you right out of your comfortable little century and hurl you smack into a time and place that'll have you begging for a nap!

software.name: Gnomes

software.name: Go
software.Description: Go is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Good Deal Games and published by Older Games, which was released in 2002.

software.name: Goal!
software.Description: When it comes to creating action-packed, super-playable football games, no one can beat Dino Dini, the mastermind behind Kick Off and Kick Off 2, except Dino Dini himself, that is... Now Dino has surpassed all his previous efforts. Goal!, his latest excursion onto the pitch, offers greater depth than any other footie game you've seen. What's more, it's got a host of features that make getting to grips with the gameplay a delight and mastering it the ultimate challenge. Goal! has all you'll ever need - or want - in a footie action game!

software.name: Golden Oldies
software.Description: Golden Oldies is an Action game, developed by The Vision Factory and published by Philips, which was released in 1991.

software.Description: Golden Oldies is an Action game, developed by The Vision Factory and published by Philips, which was released in 1991.

software.Description: Golf My Way is a Sports game, developed and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1994.

software.Description: Harvest of the Sun is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by American Interactive Media, which was released in 1991.

software.name: Hieroglyph
software.Description: Hieroglyph is a Puzzle game, developed by DOKU and published by ZYX Music, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Hotel Mario
software.Description:
An original Mario Bros game, available only on the CD-i!
Bowser has taken over the Mushroom Kingdom, he's captured Princess Toadstool and is holding her in one of the seven hotels in the kingdom. Only you and Mario can save the Princess, but you'll have to battle Koopas, Parabombs, Banzai Bill, Spiney, Monty, Pat the Bat and other nefarious nasties!
* Full Motion, Full Screen Animation! * Original Music! * CD Quality Audio and Sound Effects!

software.name: Inca
software.Description: Inca is an Adventure game, developed by Coktel Vision and published by Philips, which was released in 1993.

software.name: Inca II
software.Description: Inca II is an Adventure game, developed by Vision Games and published by Philips, which was released in 1994.

software.name: Kether
software.Description: Kether is an Action game, developed by Infogrames and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1993.

software.name: Kingdom II: Shadoan
software.Description: Kingdom II: Shadoan is an Adventure game, developed by CapDisc and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1996.

software.name: Kingdom: The Far Reaches
software.Description: Venture into a fully-animated game world of wizards and spectres, of bright steel and dark magic, of heroic deeds and base treacheries. You are Lathan, striving to restore an amulet of great power - now scattered throughout three kingdoms - and defeat the evil Torlock, whose reign of terror has vanquished your homeland. Collect items of power and magic, learn clues to determine friend from foe and strive to return Princess Grace Delight to the throne, as every move you make opens new vistas of awesome animation and the chance to conquer The Far Reaches!

software.name: L'affaire Morlov
software.Description: L'affaire Morlov is an Adventure game, developed by CPIO Multimedia and published by Titus Software, which was released in Europe in 1996.

software.name: L'Ange et le Demon
software.Description: L'Ange et le Demon is an Adventure game, developed and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1993.

software.name: Labyrinth of Crete
software.Description: Labyrinth of Crete is a Puzzle game, developed by Funhouse and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Laser Lords
software.Description: Laser Lords is an Action game, developed by Spinnaker Software and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1992.

software.name: Last Bounty Hunter, The
software.Description: As a Bounty Hunter, you will be equipped with a six-shooter and sometimes a shotgun. Careful, one of the gunfighters that protects the four outlaws is renowned fast draw world champion Wes Flowers. The pusuit of each outlaw will take you through different shootout scenarios and challenges. Plus, the order in which you stalk each outlaw will change the play action responses and difficulty level making for a different game each time you play!

software.name: Lemmings
software.Description: A unique mind-boggling game of multiple skill levels. Take command of the wackiest collection of misdirected rodents ever seen on your screen. Featuring fantastically animated graphics and simple yet addictive gameplay.

software.name: Lettergreep
software.Description: Lettergreep is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Wigant Interactive Media and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1996.

software.name: Lingo
software.Description: Lingo is a Puzzle game, developed by SPC Vision and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Link: The Faces of Evil
software.Description: Ganon and his minions have seized the peaceful island of Koridai and imprisoned Zelda. It is written, "Only Link can defeat Ganon." To do so, he must conquer the hideious Faces of Evil...Each more diabolic than the one before. Against all odds, Zelda must be freed and Koridai returned to harmony. This fast-paced action adventure game features 70 playfields. From the friendliest to the meanest, 90 astonishing character will talk to you in full animation. Encounter the spear-throwing Molblins, rock-spitting Octoroks and much more.

software.name: Litil Divil
software.Description: Litil Divil is an Action game, developed by Gremlin Interactive and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1995.

software.name: Little Monster At School
software.Description: Little Monster At School is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Broderbund and published by Philips, which was released in 1991.

software.name: Lords of the Rising Sun
software.Description: Fight the epic Gempei War of ancient Japan with a unique mix of military strategy, engaging action sequences, and role playing. Become one of two Minamoto brothers sworn to avenge their father's death or be the Taira warlord who caused it! Command Samurai armies. Direct strategic troop movements on a scrolling map of cities, castles, and monasteries. Attempt alliances, seek sacred treasures, and rescue the Emperor. Besiege castles or defend your own. Thwart ninja assassins and do battle with sword, bow, and on horseback. Enjoy absorbing hours of challenge and fun as you alter the course of history forever!

software.name: Lost Eden
software.Description: On another Earth, in another time, where dinosaurs speak and the air is charged with magic, the old ways have broken down. Where once was harmony, now are slavery and war. You must learn what's forgotten and unite the creatures of our continents against a tyrannical tyrannosaur and his carnivorous army. One chance stands between Eden and extinction: You must learn the secrets of the citadels.

software.name: Lost Ride, The
software.Description: The Lost Ride is an Action game, developed by Formula and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1998.

software.name: Lucky Luke: The Video Game
software.Description: Lucky Luke: The Video Game is an Action game, developed by The Vision Factory and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1996.

software.name: Mad Dog II: The Lost Gold
software.Description: A live-action adventure that challenges your shooting skills by confronting banditos, renegades, and Mad Dog's men. Select one of three different guides and experience a variety of trails in a quest to beat Mad Dog to the lost gold and return with it to the old mission where the longest interactive battle ever filmed awaits the more-skilled game player!

Release.name: Mad Dog II: The Lost Gold

ReleaseImages.Image: Mad Dog II The Lost Gold (US)-29240_front.jpg

Release.name: Mad Dog II: The Lost Gold

ReleaseImages.Image: Mad Dog II The Lost Gold (EU)-29241_front.jpg
Mad Dog II The Lost Gold (EU)-29241_back.jpg

software.name: Mad Dog McCree
software.Description: There's trouble in old Tuscon. Mad Dog McCree and his gang have kidnapped the town's Mayor and his daughter. To save the town, you will be challenged by a saloon full of outlaws, a hair-raising bank robbery, gunfighters, a slew of old West ambushes, and Mad Dog himself. Blaze your way into town and blast the desperadoes in a classic live-action shooting game!

software.name: Marco Polo
software.Description: Marco Polo is an Adventure game, developed by Infogrames and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Master Labyrinth
software.Description: Master Labyrinth is a Puzzle game, developed by AVM AG and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Max Magic
software.Description: Max Magic is a Miscellaneous game, developed by PF.Magic and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Mega-Maze
software.Description: Mega-Maze is an Action game, developed by PolyMedia Communications and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1994.

software.name: Merlin's Apprentice
software.Description: Merlin's Apprentice is a Puzzle game, developed by Funhouse and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1994.

software.name: Micro Machines
software.Description: Small cars and BIG racing action! Race nine turbo-charged vehicles over 36 of the most challenging circuits! Fast, furious and fantastically playable, Micro Machines is THE arcade racer!

software.name: Mozart: A Musical Biography
software.Description: Mozart: A Musical Biography is a Miscellaneous game, published by Philips, which was released in 1991.

software.name: Mutant Rampage: BodySlam
software.Description: Civilization is in decay. Teams of bionic warriors rule the ravaged capitals of the world. But now a human challenge has been issued - YOU! Only you have the speed and skill to beat the mutants and triumph in MUTANT RAMPAGE! Face ten mutant teams in ten ravaged cities around the world. Expect to be taunted and teased by in-your-face foes in full-screen digital video animation.

software.name: Myst
software.Description: Journey to an island world eerily tinged with mystery--where every rock, every scrap of paper, every fleeting sound holds a clue to an ancient mystery. Enter, if you dare, a starkly beautiful landscape shrouded in intrigue and injustice. Only your wits and imagination hold the power to unlock the shocking betrayal of ages past. During your virtual exploration, Myst challenges your wits, instincts, and powers of observation.

software.name: Mystic Midway: Phantom Express

software.Description: Origami is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Eaglevision and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Othello
software.Description: Haven't you always had a secret desire to challenge some of the greatest minds of all time? With this CD-i you can. Take on the likes of Albert Einstein or Leonardo da Vinci as they vie for the chance to play you at Othello®!

software.name: Pac-Panic
software.Description: Pac-Man makes a rare appearance outside of a maze environment in Pac-Attack, a fun and quirky puzzle game. This unique entry in the genre puts its own twist on established conventions and adds one of gaming's most iconic characters to the mix. The goal is simple: Keep your screen clear of falling blocks and ghosts by lining up blocks horizontally, causing them to disappear.

software.name: Paint School I
software.Description: Paint School I is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Spinnaker Software and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1991.

software.name: Paint School II

software.name: Rise of the Robots
software.Description: A revolution in combat games - featuring a unique combat intelligence system that adapts to and learns your style of play! The first game with film-quality, controllable 3D graphics. Robot attack routines choreographed by a martial arts expert. Witness the first ever morphing character to appear in a computer game! Awesome cinematic link sequences.

software.name: Sandy's Circus Adventure
software.Description: Sandy's Circus Adventure is an Adventure game, developed and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1990.

software.name: Sargon Chess
software.Description: Sargon Chess is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Spinnaker Software and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1991.

software.name: Scotland Yard Interactive
software.Description: Scotland Yard Interactive is an Adventure game, developed by Audio Visuellen Medien and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Secret Mission
software.Description: It's the 1950's. The place is the Indo-Chinese country of Opalia. Opalia has become the target of the USSR and the United States and its geographic position has made it a real hot spot in the Cold War battle of the superpowers. Networks of underground informants and foreign spies have totally destabilized this once peaceful country and local rebels, led by the devious Prime Minister, Vishaka, are trying to topple the king. The safety of Opalia is in your hands alone... you can't let them down!

software.name: Shaolin's Road
software.Description: Shaolin's Road is an Adventure game, developed by Infogrames and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Solar Crusade
software.Description: Solar Crusade is an Action game, developed and published by Infogrames, which was released in Europe in 1999.

software.name: Space Ace
software.Description: The evil commander Borf has kidnapped Ace's girlfriend, the beautiful Kimberly, and is plotting to enslave the Earth using his dreaded "Infanto Ray", a weapon that changes everyone it blasts into a helpless baby. Armed with only a laser gun, Ace must find and destroy the Infanto Ray, rescue Kimberly and save the Earth. All in a day's work for a superhero, right?

software.name: Space Ranger: Return to Earth
software.Description: Space Ranger: Return to Earth is an Action game, developed by Studio Interactive and published by Older Games, which was released in 2002.

software.name: Sport Freaks
software.Description: Sport Freaks is a Miscellaneous game, developed by SPC Vision and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1996.

software.name: Steel Machine
software.Description: Steel Machine is an Action game, developed by SPC Vision and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Stickybear Math
software.Description: Stickybear Math is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Optimum Resource and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1994.

software.Description: Stickybear Preschool is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Optimum Resource and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1994.

software.name: Stickybear Reading
software.Description: Stickybear Reading is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Optimum Resource and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1993.

software.name: Striker Pro
software.Description: Striker Pro is a Sports game, developed by Rage Software and published by Philips, which was released in 1994.

software.name: Super Mario's Wacky Worlds
software.Description: Super Mario's Wacky Worlds is an Action game, developed by NovaLogic and published by Philips, which was cancelled before it was released.

software.name: Surf City
software.Description: Surf City is an Adventure game, developed and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1994.

software.name: Tangram
software.Description: CD-I makes Tangram more challenging, more exciting. There are more symbols, more silhouettes, so you can develop greater skills. Just use the cursor to rotate and move the pieces. Choose free expression or tackle set tasks. And choose your own level of play: beginner, intermediate, advanced, expert - up to the highest level of all. Free Form Tangram on CD-I means moving forms, mood music, and much more fun!

software.name: Tell Me Why 1
software.Description: Tell Me Why 1 is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Philips, which was released in 1990.

software.name: Tell Me Why 2
software.Description: Tell Me Why 2 is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Philips, which was released in 1990.

software.name: Tetris
software.Description: Your pulse quickens. Beams, boxes, zig-zags and "L" shaped building blocks drop relentlessly down a narrow passage. You quickly spin, shift, and align the shapes then slide them in for a perfect fit. It's challenging and the pace is demanding. But satisfaction comes as you position each block neatly into place.

software.name: Tetsuo Gaiden
software.Description: Tetsuo Gaiden is an Action game, developed by Creative Multimedia Corporation and published by New Frontier, which was released in Europe in 1997.

software.name: Text Tiles
software.Description: Text Tiles is a Puzzle game, developed by CapDisc and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1992.

software.name: Thunder in Paradise
software.Description: Here's your shot at Paradise, bro. You're in the middle of an action-packed adventure with your cohorts Spence (Terry "Hulk" Hogan) and Bru (Chris Lemmon). Blast your way through these mind-blowing action encounters as you attempt to rescue Spence's daughter Jessica, regain control of the M.A.J.O.R., and crush your arch enemy, RAMPIKE! Race at hyperspeed through the Caribbean, aboard THUNDER, a 45-foot piece of hi-tech marine hardware. Take control of the boat's weapon systems and defend THUNDER from a shower of deadly threats. Face down minions of the psychotic RAMPIKE on the eerie trails of Rossiter's Island. Go toe-to-toe with the M.A.J.O.R., a bio-humanoid gone haywire, in a battle for Jessica's life!

software.Description: Time-Life Photography is a Miscellaneous game, developed by American Interactive Media and published by Philips, which was released in 1990.

software.name: Voyeur
software.Description:
Like To Watch?
You'll get an eye-full as you peer into your neighbors' sordid lives in the wickedly seductive interactive mystery, Voyeur. Political blackmail... murder... seductive intrigue... you'll see it all. But will you only watch - hidden like a true voyeur - or will you step into the drama and try to prevent a murder?
Voyeur combines dramatic game play with chilling suspense and erotic undertones guaranteed to keep your excitement level up. Hollywood actors, excellent film quality and an alluring storyline make this a sizzling thriller that will bring our the voyeur in everyone. Come on. We know you want to watch.

software.name: Wacky World of Miniature Golf with Eugene Levy, The
software.Description: The Wacky World of Miniature Golf with Eugene Levy is a Sports game, developed and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1993.

Release.name: The Wacky World of Miniature Golf with Eugene Levy

ReleaseImages.Image: The Wacky World of Miniature Golf with Eugene Levy (US)-78819_front.jpg

software.name: Whack a Bubble
software.Description: Whack a Bubble is a Puzzle game, developed by Creative Multimedia Corporation and published by New Frontier, which was released in Europe in 1997.

software.name: Who Shot Johnny Rock?
software.Description: It's the rollicking 30's and someone has killed popular singer Johnny Rock in this action-packed gangster whodunit. The player will need to navigate the back streets, gaming halls, funeral parlors and the dirty sections of this city to get at the clues held by a number of shady characters and solve this murder mystery. Bad guys with machine guns provide a high level of shooting action.

software.name: Wordplay
software.Description: Wordplay is a Puzzle game, developed by Backs Electronic Publishing and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: World Cup Golf
software.Description: World Cup Golf is a Sports game, developed and published by U.S. Gold, which was released in 1995.

software.name: Xplora 1: Peter Gabriel's Secret World
software.Description: Xplora 1: Peter Gabriel's Secret World is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Real World Multimedia and published by Philips Media, which was released in 1995.

software.name: Zelda's Adventure
software.Description: As the brave warrior, Princess Zelda, it's your mission to thwart the enemy, Gannon, who has captured Link and taken over Tolemac. On the way to freeing Link, you'll journey deep into the Seven Shrines of the Underworld. You will acquire powerful weapons as you fight evil characters in your attempt to restore the Age of Lightness to this magical land.

software.name: Zelda: The Wand of Gamelon
software.Description: When King Harkinian vanishes on a mission to save Gamelon, Link takes off to rescue him. But soon Link is also missing, and Zelda must free them both from their evil captors. This action adventure arcade-style game features 70 playfields, including palaces, forests, swamps, and a mysterious fairy pool. An awesome array of 90 amazing character will talk to you in full animation. Confront sword-wielding Stalfos, floating Ghini, dreaded Dodongos, pinching Gohma, and much more. You'll have a blast smashing your enemies into utter disgrace!

software.name: Zenith
software.Description: Zenith is an Action game, developed by Radarsoft and published by Philips Media, which was released in Europe in 1997.

software.name: Zombie Dinos from Planet Zeltoid
software.Description: Innocent dinosaurs have become mindless zombies, controlled by the evil Harry the Harrier and his alien Brain Blobs. But all is not lost. Wise-cracking Dexter the Dinodroid has managed to escape, bringing to Earth the incredible Time Machine. His goal: "Let's kick some brain!" Travel back in the Time Machine 200 million years. Locate each dinosaur before the Brain Blobs take control. Stop them from destroying unsuspecting humans in your hometown. Dexter will help you, along with the Time Machine's invaluable Dino Encyclopedia containing everything you need to know to save the planet.
